title: How to Make the Number 25 Into a Dog Wearing a Cap

steps.headline: Draw the numerals 2 and 5 next to each other, as if you were writing "25" on a piece of paper.
Draw a line connecting the right bottom of the '2' to the left bottom of the '5', so they are connected by a line.
Draw a small line connecting the curve of the '2' to the straight line top of the '5'.
steps.description: Essentially, just lengthen the top line of the 5.

steps.headline: Make a loop connecting the top of the 2 to the bottom, creating an oval "ear" for the dog.
Starting from the left top of the 5, draw a semi-circle to create the cap of the hat.
steps.description: You should now have the general shape of the hat-wearing canine.

steps.headline: Draw a little happy face on your dog, putting the eyes between the 2 and 5 and the nose on the curve of the 5, but don't accidentally  make it a human face.
steps.description: It is an absolute imperative that the dog not look human, as someone might confuse it and ask it to dinner.

steps.headline: Make sure the dog has a tongue or it will not be able to taste things.

text: Draw the numerals 2 and 5 next to each other, as if you were writing "25" on a piece of paper.  Draw a line connecting the right bottom of the '2' to the left bottom of the '5', so they are connected by a line.  Draw a small line connecting the curve of the '2' to the straight line top of the '5'. Essentially, just lengthen the top line of the 5. Make a loop connecting the top of the 2 to the bottom, creating an oval "ear" for the dog.  Starting from the left top of the 5, draw a semi-circle to create the cap of the hat. You should now have the general shape of the hat-wearing canine. Draw a little happy face on your dog, putting the eyes between the 2 and 5 and the nose on the curve of the 5, but don't accidentally  make it a human face. It is an absolute imperative that the dog not look human, as someone might confuse it and ask it to dinner. Make sure the dog has a tongue or it will not be able to taste things.  Finished.
